text:
<@U059YNQB962> improving TTFB to the <http://hs-sites.com|hs-sites.com> server is limited since it’s owned/operated by HubSpot. You can cache the page with a service like Cloudflare, but <http://hs-sites.com|hs-sites.com> is usually for dev purposes.

When you publish the page, is it launched on the site domain or the <http://hs-sites.com|hs-sites.com> domain?

If <http://hs-sites.com|hs-sites.com> is used for a resource that’s used within a page hosted on the site domain, you can add a preload/prefetch for the specific resource. <https://3perf.com/blog/link-rels/>
Hi all, is there a way to auto-append the site title to title tags?
